Topic: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a land habitat and a water habitat, showing different environments where living things exist.
The student can illustrate various types of plants found in each habitat, such as trees, grasses, and bushes.
The student can depict various types of animals in each habitat, including examples like lizards, squirrels, ants, fish, and clams.
The student can compare the different living things in each habitat through their drawings, showing diversity in the types of plants and animals.
The student can observe and highlight patterns in plant and animal diversity across different habitats.
